alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 5:44PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Beaverhead County through 615 PM MDT... At 543 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Salmon to 8 miles south of Lima. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lima, Jackson, Monida, Dell, Grant, Bannack Pass, Lakeview, Bannack, Snowline, Beaverhead Rock State Park, Clark Canyon, Bannack State Park and Monida Pass. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 1 and 57 . MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall may lead to minor localized flooding or debris flow down steep slopes. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
